subject: Postage
description_text:
Hello there jason here from australia. I have noticed that my pedals have reached sydney 6 days ago but havent moved since do you have an updated eta for my pedals please

Kind regards
Jason mccallum

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi jason mccallum,   Please provide your order number so that I can check where the shipment is held and contact the international courier to find out the reason.Â

Attached is a photo of the order email

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Tracking information

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

The parcel arrived today

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

Hi jason mccallum,    Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We've just returned to work after the holiday break.
